'''August, 16 2007 meeting Minutes'''

'''Weekly Meeting of the New Mexico Ubuntu LoCo'''

'''Members Present''' 
* David Thomas dthomasdigital
* Eric Kriger gcleric

'''Others Present'''
* some lurkers but no one chimed in

'''Proceedings'''

Meeting called to order at 8:00pm by Member David Thomas

'''Topics Discussed''' 

We talked a little about how the NMLUG holds meetings, and how nice it would be to work with them. Lots of talk about how Ubuntu is used in the work placed.
Products talked about were Zimbra, Nagios, and VMware. We also talked about the need for face to face meetings before Software Freedom Day on September 15th.

'''Meeting Log''' 

<nowiki>[[http://logs.ubuntu-eu.org/freenode/2007/08/17/%23ubuntu-newmexico.html|log]]</nowiki> 

Meeting adjourned 9:00pm

'''Assessment of Meeting'''

Lots of information and a time and place for a face to face meeting needs to be set.

Meeting minutes submitted by David Thomas
